column4: what is a good software you guys can recommend for me to dump a copy of a website and view it online
httrack is really good for that
i have used Httrack many times, and it works very well with static pages.
well my friend got one, that dumps the whole thing into what ever format you want , DOC,txt,html, pdf, viedo etc, but he can't seem to find it or remember the name :(
